LUKE 5.4 biþeh þan gaandida rodjands, qaþ du Seimonau:
brigg ana diupiþa, jah athahid þo natja izwara du fiskon.
LUKE 5.5 jah andhafjands Seimon qaþ du imma:
talzjand, alla naht þairharbaidjandans waiht ni nemum;
iþ afar waurda þeinamma wairpam natja.
LUKE 5.6 jah þata taujandans galukun manageins fiske filu, swe natja dishnupnodedun ize.
LUKE 5.7 jah bandwidedun gamanam þoei wesun in anþaramma skipa, ei atiddjedeina hilpan ize.
jah qemun jah gafullidedun ba þo skipa, swe sugqun.
LUKE 5.8 gaumjands þan Seimon Paitrus draus du kniwam Iesuis qiþands:
usgagg fairra mis, unte manna frawaurhts im, frauja.

LUKE 5.9 sildaleik auk dishabaida ina jah allans þans miþ imma in gafahis þize fiske þanzei ganutun; LUKE 5.10 samaleikoh þan jah Iakobau jah Iohannen, sununs Zaibaidaiaus, þaiei wesun gadailans Seimona.
fram himma nu manne siud nutans.
LUKE 5.11 jah gatiuhandans þo skipa ana airþa afleitandans allata laistidedun afar imma.
LUKE 5.12 jah warþ, miþþanei was is in ainai baurge, jah sai, manna fulls þrutsfillis jah gasaiƕands Iesu driusands ana andwairþi bad ina qiþands:
frauja, jabai wileis, magt mik gahrainjan.
LUKE 5.13 jah ufrakjands handu attaitok imma qiþands:
jah suns þata þrutsfill aflaiþ af imma.
LUKE 5.14 jah is faurbaud imma ei mann ni qeþi;
ak gagg jah ataugei þuk silban gudjin jah atbair imma fram þizai gahraineinai þeinai þatei anabaud Moses du weitwodiþai im.
LUKE 5.15 usmernoda þan þata waurd mais bi ina, jah garunnun hiuhmans managai hausjon jah leikinon fram imma sauhte seinaizo.
LUKE 5.16 iþ is was afleiþands ana auþidos jah bidjands.
LUKE 5.17 jah warþ in ainamma dage, jah is was laisjands.
jah wesun sitandans Fareisaieis jah witodalaisarjos, þaiei wesun gaqumanai us allamma haimo Galeilaias jah Iudaias jah Iairusaulwmon;
jah mahts fraujins was du hailjan ins.
LUKE 5.18 jah sai mans bairandans ana ligra mannan saei was usliþa, jah sokidedun ƕaiwa ina innatbereina jah galagidideina in andwairþja is.
LUKE 5.19 jah ni bigitandans ƕaiwa innatbereina ina in manageins, ussteigandans ana hrot and skaljos, gasatidedun ina miþ þamma badja in midjaim faura Iesua.
LUKE 5.20 jah gasaiƕands galaubein ize qaþ du þamma usliþin:
LUKE 5.21 jah dugunnun þagkjan þai bokarjos jah Fareisaieis qiþandans:
ƕas ist sa, saei rodeiþ naiteinins?
ƕas mag afletan frawaurhtins, alja ains guþ?
LUKE 5.22 ufkunnands þan Iesus mitonins ize andhafjands qaþ du im:
LUKE 5.23 ƕaþar ist azetizo qiþan: afletanda þus frawaurhteis, þau qiþan: urreis jah gagg?
LUKE 5.24 aþþan ei witeid þatei waldufni habaid sa sunus mans ana airþai afletan frawaurhtins,
urreis jah ushafjands þata badi þeinata gagg in gard þeinana.
LUKE 5.25 jah sunsaiw usstandands in andwairþja ize, ushafjands ana þammei lag, galaiþ in gard seinana mikiljands guþ.
LUKE 5.26 jah usfilmei dissat allans, jah mikilidedun guþ jah fullai waurþun agisis qiþandans þatei
LUKE 5.27 jah afar þata usiddja jah gasaƕ motari, namin Laiwwi, sitandan ana motastada, jah qaþ du imma:
LUKE 5.28 jah bileiþands allaim, usstandands iddja afar imma.
LUKE 5.29 jah gawaurhta dauht mikila Laiwweis imma in garda seinamma, jah was managei motarje mikila jah anþaraize, þaiei wesun miþ im anakumbjandans.
LUKE 5.30 jah birodidedun bokarjos ize jah Fareisaieis du siponjam is qiþandans:
duƕe miþ þaim motarjam jah frawaurhtaim matjid jah drigkid?
LUKE 5.31 jah andhafjands Iesus qaþ du im:
ni þaurbun hailai leikeis, ak þai unhailans.
LUKE 5.32 ni qam laþon garaihtans, ak frawaurhtans in idreiga.
